issue.title: Robot falls while carrying tools in habitat

content.raw:
After some more testing, I am still seeing the issue as well.  It appears to be less common - so maybe there are multiple causes and one has been resolved?  Anyone else have a feel if the problem is more or less common now?

Louise - should I re-open this one or open a new one to continue tracking this issue?
